word_mean: 精氨酸：一种氨基酸，C6H14N4O2，由蛋白质水解或消化产生
它是一种六碳碱(Schulze和Steiger，1886)，并且供给脒基以合成肌酸。精氨酸也可由尿素循环中将氮原子从天门冬氨酸盐转移到瓜氨酸时形成，然后放出尿素，形成鸟氨酸

sentence.Network_en: Arginine accumulates extensively in some plants as a soluble amino acid.
sentence.Network_cn: 在某些植物中,精氨酸以可溶性氨基酸大量积累.

sentence.Network_en: Large amounts of cystine as well as arginine, lysine and ornithine are excreted.
sentence.Network_cn: 大量的胱氨酸、精氨酸 、 赖氨酸和鸣氨酸被排出.

sentence.Network_en: Large amount of cystine as well as arginine lysine and ornithine are excreted in the urine.
sentence.Network_cn: 从患者的尿中排出大量的胱氨酸,精氨酸,赖氨酸和鸟氨酸.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from German Arginin, perhaps from Greek arginoeis 'bright-shining, white'

means.word_mean: 1. a bitter tasting amino acid found in proteins and necessary for nutrition; its absence from the diet leads to a reduced production of spermatozoa

auth_sentence.content: The juicy fruit is also brimming with citrulline and arginine, which keep arteries healthy and help increase blood flow.
